content.page_title: Glowboost vitamin c serum vs radiancemax niacinamide serum comparison
content.introduction: Compare GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum and RadianceMax Niacinamide Serum based on the provided product data. Both are serum products with distinct formulations and benefits.

comparison_ingredients.content: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum uniquely features Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C. RadianceMax Niacinamide Serum uniquely features Peptides, Niacinamide.

comparison_benefits.content: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum specifically provides Fades dark spots, Brightening. RadianceMax Niacinamide Serum focuses on Evens skin tone, Oil control.

comparison_prices.content: Price comparison: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum (₹699) vs RadianceMax Niacinamide Serum (₹749).

key_differences: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum contains Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C
RadianceMax Niacinamide Serum contains Peptides, Niacinamide
GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum focuses on Fades dark spots, Brightening
RadianceMax Niacinamide Serum emphasizes Evens skin tone, Oil control
content.recommendation: Choose GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum for brightening and dark spot correction.
